body: Your eyes develop keener sight in dim light and darkness.
name: Fiend Sight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tieflings/New Racial Rules/Tiefling Feats/Fiend Sight

sections.body: You gain low-light vision and your darkvision improves to 120 ft.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You can take this feat twice. When you take it a second time, you gain the see in darkness universal monster ability.
sections.name: Special
